amendment.description: Amendment added language which provides that in the event of the failure of a launch from the People's Republic of China of a satellite of United States origin, no United States person may participate in any subsequent investigation of the failure.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit U.S. participation in any investigation of a launch failure of a U.S. satellite from the People's Republic of China. Amendment is numbered 38 and made in order as the second amendment in Part A of H. Rept. 105-544.

action.text: On agreeing to the Bereuter amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 414 - 7 (Roll No. 168).
